name: Avante Theme Extensions
author: Themely

sections.description:
This plugin adds widgets required by the Avante WordPress theme by Themely.

Copyright

Avante Theme Extensions WordPress Plugin, Copyright 2019 Ishmael ‘Hans’ Desjarlais

sections.installation:
1. Log into your Admin Dashboard
  2. Navigate to the Plugins page.
  3. Click on the Install button.
  4. Upload this plugin.
  5. Once installed, activate the plugin.
  6. Navigate to the Widgets page under Appearance > Widgets.
